price: Dã Allah zai tambaye ku su (dũkiyõyin) har Ya wajabta muku bãyarwa, zã ku yi rõwa kuma Ya fitar da miyãgun ƙulle-ƙullenku.
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum
translations: He were to ask you for it
